lines.text:
[just before a commercial break]
We'll be back with more stuff right after this message.

[just before Chuck Barris first appears in the episode]
And now, ladies and gentlemen, here is the host and star of the show, my daddy!

[at the start of the show]
From Hollywood, almost live, it's The Gong Show!

[commercial break]
We'll be back, with more STUFF... right after this message!
